name: Techmino: 方块研究所
description:
Welcome to Techmino, a block-stacking game by 26F Studio! Immerse yourself in more than 100 modes of this modern yet familiar game, with a variety of difficulties so everyone can have a great time! Hang out and challenge your friends and players around the world in the multiplayer modes, and discover some hidden easter eggs all over the game!

TECHMINO WITH YOURSELF
* Improve and master your stacking skills with singleplayer modes
* Battle against our AI everywhere, every time!
* Modify the controls to have an ultimate Techmino experience

TECHMINO WITH YOUR MATES
* Create rooms and battle against your friends
* Customize your match with diverse parameters
* Chat with each other while competing with your companions

Last but not least, Techmino is fun!
